Pinyin1: zhège zhǔyi hǎojíle 。
Translate1: That's a great idea.

Pinyin1: wèidao hǎojíle !
Translate1: Tastes great!

Pinyin1: tā de yīngwén bàngjíle 。
Translate1: His English is excellent.

Pinyin1: hūnlǐ rènao jíle 。
Translate1: The wedding was very lively.

Pinyin1: yīdiǎn shēngyīn dū méiyǒu ， ānjìng jíle 。
Chinese1: 一点声音都没有，安静极了。
Translate1: There was no sound at all, it was extremely quiet.

Pinyin1: zuótiān de pàiduì wúliáo jíle !
Translate1: Yesterday's party was so boring!

Pinyin1: tā nàme shēngqì ， wǒmen dōu hàipà jíle 。
Chinese1: 他那么生气，我们都害怕极了。
Translate1: He was so angry that we were all terrified.

Pinyin1: gāokǎo nàtiān ， wǒ jǐnzhāng jíle 。
Translate1: On the day of the college entrance examination, I was extremely nervous.

Pinyin1: zhèjiàn shì ràng wǒmen dōu gāngà jíle 。
Chinese1: 这件事让我们都尴尬极了。
Translate1: This incident embarrasses us all.

Pinyin1: nàgè nánhái tǎoyàn jíle !
Translate1: That boy is so annoying!

Pinyin1: nǐ de liǎn hónghóngde 。
Translate1: Your face is red.

Pinyin1: bǎobǎo de yǎnjīng dàdàde 。
Translate1: The baby's eyes are big.

Pinyin1: jīnwǎn de yuèliang yuányuánde 。
Translate1: The moon is full tonight.

Pinyin1: tā bàba gāogāo pàngpàngde 。
Translate1: Her father is tall and fat.

Pinyin1: wǒ mèimei shòushòuxiǎoxiǎo de 。
Translate1: My sister is thin and small.

Pinyin1: gāogāoxìngxìng
Translate1: happily

Pinyin1: rèrènàonào
Translate1: lively

Pinyin1: piāopiāoliàngliàng
Translate1: pretty

Pinyin1: shūshufufu
Translate1: Comfortable

Pinyin1: ānānjìngjìng
Translate1: Quiet

Pinyin1: wǒmen qīngqingchǔchǔ de kàndào tā gēn yīgè pàngpàngde nánrén shàngchē le 。
Chinese1: 我们清清楚楚的看到他跟一个胖胖的男人上车了。
Translate1: We clearly saw him get into the car with a fat man.

Pinyin1: wǒ zhēnxiǎng shūshufufu de tǎng zài shāfā shàng kàndiànshì 。
Chinese1: 我真想舒舒服服地躺在沙发上看电视。
Translate1: I really want to lie comfortably on the sofa and watch TV.

Pinyin1: nǐ māma xīnxīnkǔkǔ de zuò le liǎnggè xiǎoshí de fàn ， nǐ zěnme bùchī ？
Chinese1: 你妈妈辛辛苦苦地做了两个小时的饭，你怎么不吃？
Translate1: Your mother has worked so hard to cook a meal for two hours, why don't you eat it?

Pinyin1: mèimei kuài guòshēngrì le ， wǒ dǎsuàn gěi tā bàn yīgè shēngripàiduì 。
Chinese1: 妹妹快过生日了，我打算给她办一个生日派对。
Translate1: My sister's birthday is coming soon, and I plan to hold a birthday party for her.

Pinyin1: lái ， hēdiǎn jiǔ ， gāoxìng gāoxìng 。
Translate1: Come on, have a drink and be happy.

Pinyin1: dào zhèlǐ lái liángkuai liángkuai 。
Translate1: Come here to cool off.

Pinyin1: wǒ xiǎng qù wàimiàn zǒuzǒu ， ānjìng yīxià 。
Chinese1: 我想去外面走走，安静一下。
Translate1: I want to go for a walk outside and be quiet.

Pinyin1: xiǎng bùxiǎng qù zuò gè ànmó ， fàngsōng yīxià 。
Chinese1: 想不想去做个按摩，放松一下。
Translate1: Want to go for a massage and relax.

Pinyin1: nǐ yào nǔlì de xuéxí 。
Translate1: You have to study hard.

Pinyin1: yǔtiān dì huá ， mànmàn de zǒu 。
Translate1: On rainy days, the ground is slippery, walk slowly.

Pinyin1: tā shùnlì de tōngguò kǎoshì le 。
Translate1: He passed the exam successfully.

Pinyin1: tā rènzhēn de duì wǒ shuō ： “ wǒ xǐhuan nǐ 。
Chinese1: 他认真地对我说：“我喜欢你。
Translate1: He said to me seriously: "I like you".

Pinyin1: tā rèqíng de yōngbào le wǒ 。
Translate1: He hugged me warmly.

Pinyin1: tā jīdòng de duì wǒ shuō “ xièxie ” 。
Translate1: She excitedly said "thank you" to me.

Pinyin1: lǎoshī shēngqì de kànzhe wǒmen 。
Translate1: The teacher looked at us angrily.

Pinyin1: háizi men kāixīn dechàng le qǐlai 。
Chinese1: 孩子们开心地唱了起来。
Translate1: The children sang happily.

Pinyin1: dàjiā dōu zài jiàoshì lǐ ānānjìngjìng de kànshū 。
Chinese1: 大家都在教室里安安静静地看书。
Translate1: Everyone is reading quietly in the classroom.

Pinyin1: wǒ xīwàng nǐ kuàikuàilèlè de zhǎngdà 。
Chinese1: 我希望你快快乐乐地长大。
Translate1: I hope you grow up happily.

Pinyin1: yòu xiàyǔ le ！
Translate1: It's raining again!

Pinyin1: nǐ yòu chídào le 。
Translate1: You are late again.

Pinyin1: bǎobǎo yòu kū le 。
Translate1: The baby is crying again.

Pinyin1: wǒ yòu wàng le 。
Translate1: I forgot again.

Pinyin1: tā yòu méilái shàngkè 。
Translate1: He didn't come to class again.

Pinyin1: nǐ zhècì yòu bù fùqián ？
Translate1: You don't pay again this time?

Pinyin1: nǐ yòu bù cānjiā ？
Translate1: Are you not going to participate?

Pinyin1: duìbuqǐ ， wǒ yòu méidài shū 。
Translate1: Sorry, I don't have any books with me.

Pinyin1: jīntiān yòu yào jiābān le ！
Translate1: I have to work overtime again today!

Pinyin1: lǎobǎn qǐngkè ， yòu kěyǐ chī dàcān le ！
Chinese1: 老板请客，又可以吃大餐了！
Translate1: The boss treats you, and you can have a big meal again!

Pinyin1: kuài guònián le ， wǒmen yòu néng ná hóngbāo le ！
Chinese1: 快过年了，我们又能拿红包了！
Translate1: It's almost Chinese New Year, we can get red envelopes again!

Pinyin1: wǒ yīzhí zài xuéxí zhōngwén 。
Translate1: I have been studying Chinese.

Pinyin1: zuótiānwǎnshàng wǒ yīzhí zài zuòzuòyè 。
Chinese1: 昨天晚上我一直在做作业。
Translate1: I was doing my homework last night.

Pinyin1: lǎobǎn yīzhí hěn máng 。
Translate1: The boss has been very busy.

Pinyin1: wǒ yīzhí hěn xǐhuan nǐ 。
Translate1: I have always liked you.

Pinyin1: bàba yīzhí dōu bù chōuyān 。
Translate1: Dad has never smoked.

Pinyin1: wǒ nánpéngyou yīzhí zài zhōngguó jiào yīngwén 。
Chinese1: 我男朋友一直在中国教英文。
Translate1: My boyfriend has been teaching English in China.

Pinyin1: shíbāsuì yǐhòu ， tā yīzhí yīgè rénzhù 。
Chinese1: 十八岁以后，他一直一个人住。
Translate1: Since the age of eighteen, he has been living alone.

Pinyin1: nǐ yīzhí zài zhèjiā gōngsī gōngzuò ma ？
Chinese1: 你一直在这家公司工作吗？
Translate1: Have you been working for this company?

Pinyin1: nǐmen yīzhí zhùzàiyīqǐ ma ？
Translate1: Have you been living together?

Pinyin1: běijīng de kōngqì yīzhí hěn bùhǎo 。
Chinese1: 北京的空气一直很不好。
Translate1: The air in Beijing has always been very bad.

Pinyin1: tā zǒngshì chídào 。
Translate1: He is always late.

Pinyin1: wǒ zǒngshì wàngjì zhège cí 。
Translate1: I keep forgetting this word.

Pinyin1: tā zǒngshì yīgè rén chīfàn 。
Translate1: He always eats alone.

Pinyin1: nǐ nánpéngyou zǒngshì shuō zānghuà 。
Translate1: Your boyfriend is always swearing.

Pinyin1: wǒ de xuésheng zǒngshì wèn wǒ hěnduō yǒuyìsi de wèntí 。
Chinese1: 我的学生总是问我很多有意思的问题。
Translate1: My students always ask me a lot of interesting questions.

Pinyin1: tā zǒngshì hěnlěi 。
Translate1: He is always tired.

Pinyin1: nǐ wèishénme zǒngshì hěn máng ？
Translate1: why are you always so busy

Pinyin1: nǐjiā zǒngshì hěn gānjìng 。
Translate1: Your home is always clean.

Pinyin1: háizi men zǒngshì fēicháng kāixīn 。
Translate1: The kids are always so happy.

Pinyin1: wǒ de xuésheng zǒngshì tèbié nǔlì 。
Chinese1: 我的学生总是特别努力。
Translate1: My students always work really hard.

Pinyin1: tāmen yǐjīng liǎngtiān méi chī dōngxi le 。
Chinese1: 他们已经两天没吃东西了。
Translate1: They have not eaten for two days.

Pinyin1: wǒmen yǐjīng shínián méijiàn le 。
Translate1: We haven't seen each other for ten years.

Pinyin1: tā yǐjīng yīgè xīngqī méi xǐzǎo le 。
Chinese1: 他已经一个星期没洗澡了。
Translate1: He hasn't showered for a week.

Pinyin1: nǐ duōchángshíjiān méi guāhúzi le ？
Chinese1: 你多长时间没刮胡子了？
Translate1: How long has it been since you shaved?

Pinyin1: tā bànge yuè méi chūmén le 。
Translate1: She hasn't gone out for half a month.

Pinyin1: nǐmen duōjiǔ méi huíjiā le ？
Translate1: How long have you been home?

Pinyin1: nǐ duōjiǔ méi xiūjià le ？
Translate1: How long has it been since you took a vacation?

Pinyin1: mǎi bā ， nǐ yǐjīng yīnián duō méi mǎi xīn yīfú le 。
Chinese1: 买吧，你已经一年多没买新衣服了。
Translate1: Go ahead, you haven't bought new clothes in over a year.

Pinyin1: nǐ hǎoxiàng hěnjiǔméi zhème kāixīn le 。
Chinese1: 你好像很久没这么开心了。
Translate1: It seems like you haven't been this happy in a long time.

Pinyin1: wǒ yǐjīng shínián méi lái zhōngguó le 。
Chinese1: 我已经十年没来中国了。
Translate1: I haven't been to China for ten years.

Pinyin1: wǒ shàngcì lái zhōngguó shì èrlíngyīlíng nián 。
Translate1: The last time I came to China was 2010.

Pinyin1: nǐ zhōngyú dào le ！
Translate1: You are finally here!

Pinyin1: wǒmen zhōngyú jiànmiàn le ！
Translate1: We finally meet!

Pinyin1: nǐmen zhōngyú míngbai le 。
Translate1: You finally understand.

Pinyin1: zuòyè zhōngyú zuò wán le ！
Translate1: The homework is finally done!

Pinyin1: fēijī zhōngyú qǐfēi le ！
Translate1: The plane finally took off!

Pinyin1: nǐmen zhōngyú juédìng le 。
Translate1: You have finally decided.

Pinyin1: fàn zhōngyú zuòhǎo le 。
Translate1: The meal is finally ready.

Pinyin1: zhège yuànwàng zhōngyú shíxiàn le ！
Translate1: This wish finally came true!

Pinyin1: wǒmen zhǎo le liǎnggè duō xiǎoshí ， zhōngyú zhǎodào le nàjiādiàn 。
Chinese1: 我们找了两个多小时，终于找到了那家店。
Translate1: We searched for more than two hours and finally found the store.

Pinyin1: zhèxiē wèntí zhōngyú jiějué le 。
Translate1: These problems are finally solved.

Pinyin1: wǒ zuótiānwǎnshàng shíyīdiǎn cái dào jiā 。
Chinese1: 我昨天晚上十一点才到家。
Translate1: I didn't get home until eleven o'clock last night.

Pinyin1: tā èrshíwǔsuì cái shàng dàxué 。
Translate1: He didn't go to college until he was twenty-five.

Pinyin1: tā sìshísuì cái jiéhūn 。
Translate1: She didn't get married until she was forty.

Pinyin1: wǒ nǚér zuótiān shíèrdiǎn cái shuìjiào ， zuòyè tàiduō le 。
Chinese1: 我女儿昨天十二点才睡觉，作业太多了。
Translate1: My daughter didn't go to bed until twelve o'clock yesterday, and she had too much homework.

Pinyin1: nǐ jiǔdiǎn shàngbān ， bādiǎnbàn cái qǐchuáng ？
Chinese1: 你九点上班，八点半才起床？
Translate1: You go to work at nine and wake up at half past eight?

Pinyin1: fēijī gānggang cái qǐfēi ， wǎndiǎn le liǎnggè xiǎoshí 。
Chinese1: 飞机刚刚才起飞，晚点了两个小时。
Translate1: The plane had just taken off and was two hours late.

Pinyin1: diànyǐng qīdiǎn bàn kāishǐ ， kěshì yīnwèi dǔchē ， wǒmen bādiǎn cái dào 。
Chinese1: 电影七点半开始，可是因为堵车，我们八点才到。
Translate1: The movie started at 7:30, but we didn't arrive until 8 because of the traffic jam.

Pinyin1: nǐ zěnme cái chīwǎnfàn ？
Translate1: How did you just have dinner?

Pinyin1: nǐ zěnme cái lái ？
Translate1: Why did you come here?

Pinyin1: wǒ zhǐyǒu yīgè gēge 。
Translate1: I only have one brother.

Pinyin1: wǒmen zhǐyǒu shíkuàiqián 。
Translate1: We only have ten dollars.

Pinyin1: wǒmen gōngsī zhǐyǒu liǎnggè yuángōng 。
Chinese1: 我们公司只有两个员工。
Translate1: There are only two employees in our company.

Pinyin1: nǐ zhǐ ài chī ròu ma ？
Translate1: Do you only love meat?

Pinyin1: tāmen zhǐhuì shuō yīngwén 。
Translate1: They only speak English.

Pinyin1: wǒ zhǐnéng shuō liǎngjù zhōngwén 。
Translate1: I can only speak two sentences of Chinese.

Pinyin1: nǐmen zhǐyào kāfēi ma ？
Translate1: Do you just want coffee?

Pinyin1: wǒ lǎopó zhǐyào yīgè háizi 。
Translate1: My wife only has one child.

Pinyin1: bǎobǎo zhǐhuì zǒu ， bùhuì pǎo 。
Translate1: The baby can only walk, not run.

Pinyin1: wǒ zhǐ xiǎng gēn nǐ zài yīqǐ 。
Translate1: I just want to be with you.

Pinyin1: xiān xǐshǒu zài chī 。
Translate1: Wash your hands before eating.

Pinyin1: wǒ xǐhuan xiān xǐzǎo ， zài shuìjiào 。
Translate1: I like to take a shower before going to bed.

Pinyin1: qǐng nǐ xiān mǎipiào zài jìnqù 。
Translate1: Please buy a ticket before entering.

Pinyin1: nǐ yào xiān zuòzuòyè ， zài kàndiànshì 。
Chinese1: 你要先做作业，再看电视。
Translate1: You have to do your homework before watching TV.

Pinyin1: wǒ xiǎng xiān zhǎo gōngzuò ， zài bānjiā 。
Translate1: I want to find a job first and then move.

Pinyin1: xiān chīfàn zàishuō 。
Translate1: Let's eat first.

Pinyin1: xiān xiūxi yīxià zàishuō 。
Translate1: Let's take a break first.

Pinyin1: nǐ xiān kàn wán zàishuō 。
Translate1: You read it first.

Pinyin1: wǒ xiān wèn yīxià lǎobǎn zàishuō 。
Translate1: I'll ask the boss first.

Pinyin1: nǐmen xiān tǎolùnyīxià zàishuō 。
Translate1: Let's discuss it first.

Pinyin1: jīntiān zǎoshang wǒ qǐchuáng yǐhòu xiān zhǔnbèi zǎofàn ， zài jiào háizi men qǐchuáng 。
Chinese1: 今天早上我起床以后先准备早饭，再叫孩子们起床。
Translate1: This morning I woke up and prepared breakfast before waking the kids up.

Pinyin1: bùyào yībiān chī dōngxi ， yībiān shuōhuà 。
Chinese1: 不要一边吃东西，一边说话。
Translate1: Don't eat while talking.

Pinyin1: wǒ chángcháng yībiān xǐzǎo ， yībiān chànggē 。
Chinese1: 我常常一边洗澡，一边唱歌。
Translate1: I often take a shower while singing.

Pinyin1: háizi xǐhuan yībiān chīfàn ， yībiān wán 。
Chinese1: 孩子喜欢一边吃饭，一边玩。
Translate1: Children like to eat and play at the same time.

Pinyin1: nǐ xǐhuan yībiān tīng yīnyuè ， yībiān zuòzuòyè ma ？
Chinese1: 你喜欢一边听音乐，一边做作业吗？
Translate1: Do you like listening to music while doing your homework?

Pinyin1: wǒmen yībiān zǒu yībiān liáo bā 。
Translate1: Let's talk as we go.

Pinyin1: qǐng nǐ yībiān dú yībiān xiě 。
Translate1: Please read and write at the same time.

Pinyin1: bùyào yībiān kāichē ， yībiān dǎdiànhuà 。
Chinese1: 不要一边开车，一边打电话。
Translate1: Don't drive while talking on the phone.

Pinyin1: lǎobǎn xǐhuan yībiān chōuyān ， yībiān gōngzuò 。
Chinese1: 老板喜欢一边抽烟，一边工作。
Translate1: The boss likes to smoke while working.

Pinyin1: hěnduō rén dōu yībiān shàngbān ， yībiān wán shǒujī 。
Chinese1: 很多人兜一边上班，一边玩手机。
Translate1: Many people go to work and play with their mobile phones at the same time.

Pinyin1: tā chángcháng yībiān zuòfàn ， yībiān dài háizi 。
Chinese1: 她常常一边做饭，一边带孩子。
Translate1: She often cooks while taking care of the children.

Pinyin1: nǐ zěnme lǎoshi jiābān ？
Translate1: Why do you always work overtime?

Pinyin1: nàgè háizi lǎoshuō zānghuà 。
Translate1: That kid keeps swearing.

Pinyin1: nǐ zěnme lǎoshi bù gāoxìng ？
Translate1: Why are you always unhappy?

Pinyin1: nǐ érzi shàngkè de shíhou lǎoshi shuōhuà 。
Chinese1: 你儿子上课的时候老是说话。
Translate1: Your son keeps talking in class.

Pinyin1: zhège lǎoshī lǎoshi zhème yánsù 。
Chinese1: 这个老师老是这么严肃。
Translate1: This teacher is always so serious.

Pinyin1: biélǎoshì bàoyuàn 。
Translate1: Stop complaining all the time.

Pinyin1: zhège jīqì lǎoshi chū wèntí 。
Translate1: This machine keeps breaking down.

Pinyin1: tā jīngcháng chídào ， huán lǎo shì zhǎo jièkǒu 。
Chinese1: 他经常迟到，还老是找借口。
Translate1: He is often late and always making excuses.

Pinyin1: tā lǎo shì wàngdài yàoshi 。
Translate1: He keeps forgetting his keys.

Pinyin1: nǐlǎo shì zhème xiōng gànmá ？
Translate1: Why are you always so fierce?

Pinyin1: tā zhēn tǎoyàn ， lǎoshi gēn péngyou jièqián 。
Chinese1: 他真讨厌，老是跟朋友借钱。
Translate1: He is so annoying, always borrowing money from friends.

Pinyin1: nǐ cái èrshísuì ？
Translate1: You are only twenty years old?

Pinyin1: zhège bāncái liǎnggè xuésheng 。
Translate1: There are only two students in this class.

Pinyin1: nǐ de gōngzī cái liǎngqiān ？
Translate1: Your salary is only two thousand?

Pinyin1: zhè dùnfàn cái èrshíkuài ， tài piányi le ！
Chinese1: 这顿饭才二十块，太便宜了！
Translate1: This meal is only 20 yuan, which is too cheap!

Pinyin1: nǐ cái yībǎijīn ， huányào jiǎnféi ？
Translate1: You only weigh a hundred catties, and you still want to lose weight?

Pinyin1: tā cái lái le liǎnggè yuè 。
Translate1: She's only been here for two months.

Pinyin1: zhèjiā diàn guānmén le ？
Translate1: The store is closed?

Pinyin1: yǐjīng liǎngtiān le ， nǐ cái kàn wán yīyè ？
Chinese1: 已经两天了，你才看完一页？
Translate1: It's been two days and you've only read one page?

Pinyin1: wǒmen cái wán le yīhuìr ， zài wán yīhuìr bā ？
Chinese1: 我们才玩了一会儿，再玩一会儿吧？
Translate1: We've only played for a while, shall we play for a while?

Pinyin1: tāmen jiéhūn le ？
Translate1: they got married?

Pinyin1: tā shuō dé zhème kuài ， nǐmen tīngdedǒng ma ？
Chinese1: 他说得这么快，你们听得懂吗？
Translate1: He speaks so fast, can you understand?

Pinyin1: wǒ méixiǎngdào zhège kǎoshì zhème nán 。
Chinese1: 我没想到这个考试这么难。
Translate1: I didn't expect this test to be so difficult.

Pinyin1: yǔ zhème dà ， míngtiān zài qù bā 。
Translate1: It's raining so hard, let's go tomorrow.

Pinyin1: nǐ nàme cōngming ， yīdìng néng cāi dào 。
Chinese1: 你那么聪明，一定能猜到。
Translate1: You are so smart, you must be able to guess.

Pinyin1: lǎobǎn nàme máng ， kěndìng méi shíjiān 。
Chinese1: 老板那么忙，肯定没时间。
Translate1: The boss is so busy, he must not have time.

Pinyin1: jīntiān zěnme zhème lěng ？
Translate1: Why is it so cold today?

Pinyin1: nǐ zěnme zhème méi lǐmào ？
Translate1: Why are you so rude?

Pinyin1: nǐ zěnme huì liǎojiě nàme duō zhōngguó lìshǐ ？
Chinese1: 你怎么会了解那么多中国历史？
Translate1: How do you know so much Chinese history?

Pinyin1: kējì nàme fādá ， shénme dōu shì yǒu kěnéng de 。
Chinese1: 科技那么发达，什么都是有可能的。
Translate1: With technology so advanced, anything is possible.

Pinyin1: wǒ hé nǐ yīyàng 。
Translate1: Me too.

Pinyin1: tā de xìnggé gēn tā māma yīyàng 。
Chinese1: 他的性格跟他妈妈一样。
Translate1: His personality is just like his mother's.

Pinyin1: běijīng de tiānqì hé shànghǎi bù yīyàng 。
Chinese1: 北京的天气和上海不一样。
Translate1: The weather in Beijing is different from that in Shanghai.

Pinyin1: zhège cí de yìsi hé nàgè cí yīyàng ma ？
Chinese1: 这个词的意思和那个词一样吗？
Translate1: Does this word mean the same as that word?

Pinyin1: nǐjiā gēn wǒjiā yīyàng dà 。
Translate1: Your house is as big as mine.

Pinyin1: tā hé tā gēge yīyàng gāo 。
Translate1: She is as tall as her brother.

Pinyin1: nǐ de tóufa hé wǒ de tóufa yīyàng cháng 。
Chinese1: 你的头发和我的头发一样长。
Translate1: Your hair is as long as mine.

Pinyin1: zhèlǐ de tiānqì gēn wǒ lǎojiā yīyàng shūfu 。
Chinese1: 这里的天气跟我老家一样舒服。
Translate1: The weather here is as comfortable as my hometown.

Pinyin1: nǐ gēn lǎobǎn yīyàng máng ma ？
Translate1: Are you as busy as your boss?

Pinyin1: tā nánpéngyou yòu gāo yòu shuài 。
Translate1: Her boyfriend is tall and handsome.

Pinyin1: zhège fángzi yòu dà yòu liàng 。
Translate1: The house is big and bright.

Pinyin1: tā de tóufa yòu hēiyòuliàng 。
Translate1: Her hair is black and shiny.

Pinyin1: wǒ jiějie yòu cōngming yòu piàoliang 。
Translate1: My sister is smart and beautiful.

Pinyin1: zhōngguó cài yòu piányi yòu hàochī 。
Translate1: Chinese food is cheap and delicious.

Pinyin1: nǐmen lǎobǎn yòu niánqīng yòu yǒuqián 。
Chinese1: 你们老板又年轻又有钱。
Translate1: Your boss is young and rich.

Pinyin1: zhèlǐ de kāfēi yòu guì yòu nán hē 。
Chinese1: 这里的咖啡又贵又难喝。
Translate1: The coffee here is expensive and bad.

Pinyin1: wǒjiā xiǎogǒu yòu kěài yòu tīnghuà 。
Chinese1: 我家小狗又可爱又听话。
Translate1: My puppy is cute and obedient.

Pinyin1: shànghǎi de dōngtiān yòu lěng yòu shī 。
Translate1: Winter in Shanghai is cold and wet.

Pinyin1: tā xiǎoshíhou yòu ǎi yòu shòu 。
Translate1: She was short and thin as a child.

Pinyin1: zhège wèntí bǐjiàojiǎndān 。
Translate1: This problem is relatively simple.

Pinyin1: wǒ juéde zhège jiàgé bǐjiào guì 。
Chinese1: 我觉得这个价格比较贵。
Translate1: I think the price is more expensive.

Pinyin1: wǒjiā lí shìzhōngxīn bǐjiào jìn 。
Translate1: My home is relatively close to the city center.

Pinyin1: dàchéngshì de gōngzuò yālì bǐjiào dà 。
Chinese1: 大城市的工作压力比较大。
Translate1: Work pressure in big cities is relatively high.

Pinyin1: nǐ shàngbān zuòdìtiě bǐjiào fāngbiàn bā ？
Chinese1: 你上班坐地铁比较方便吧？
Translate1: Is it more convenient for you to take the subway to work?

Pinyin1: wǒ bǐjiào tǎoyàn nánrén shuō zānghuà 。
Chinese1: 我比较讨厌男人说脏话。
Translate1: I don't like dirty words from men.

Pinyin1: yīgè rénduō hǎo ！
Translate1: How good it is to be alone!

Pinyin1: nǐ nǚér duō cōngming a ！
Translate1: How smart your daughter is!

Pinyin1: jīntiāntiānqì duō shūfu ！
Translate1: What a pleasant day it is!

Pinyin1: nǐ kàn zhège dìfāng ， duōměi a ！
Translate1: Look at this place, how beautiful it is!

Pinyin1: xué zhōngwén duō yǒuyìsi a ！
Translate1: Learning Chinese is so interesting!

Pinyin1: zuòdìtiě duō fāngbiàn ！
Translate1: How convenient it is to take the subway!

Pinyin1: nǐ kàn zhège xiǎogǒu ， duō kěài ！
Translate1: Look at this puppy, how cute it is!

Pinyin1: zhèyàng zuò duō máfan ！
Translate1: What a hassle!

Pinyin1: zhèxiē cài duō hàochī a ！
Translate1: How delicious are these dishes!

Pinyin1: nǐ nánpéngyou duōshuài a ！
Translate1: How handsome is your boyfriend!

Pinyin1: piàoliang de nǚháir
Translate1: beautiful girl

Pinyin1: wǒ xǐhuan xīnxiān de guǒzhī 。
Translate1: I like fresh juices.

Pinyin1: tā chángcháng mǎi piányi de dōngxi 。
Translate1: He often buys cheap things.

Pinyin1: háizi xǐhuan chī shénme dōngxi ？ tián de 。
Chinese1: 孩子喜欢吃什么东西？甜的。
Translate1: What does the child like to eat? Sweet.

Pinyin1: nǐ xǐhuan nǎ zhǒng nǚhái ？ piàoliang de 。
Chinese1: 你喜欢哪种女孩？漂亮的。
Translate1: what kind of girl do you like beautiful.

Pinyin1: nǐ yào hē lěngshuǐ háishi rèshuǐ ？ lěng de 。
Chinese1: 你要喝冷水还是热水？冷的。
Translate1: Do you want cold water or hot water? cold.

Pinyin1: nǐ xiǎng zhǎo shénmeyàng de nánpéngyou ？ yǒuqián de 。
Chinese1: 你想找什么样的男朋友？有钱的。
Translate1: What kind of boyfriend are you looking for? rich.

Pinyin1: nǐ bù xǐhuan chī shénme cài ？ là de 。
Chinese1: 你不喜欢吃什么菜？辣的。
Translate1: What dish do you dislike? spicy.

Pinyin1: wǒ hēkāfēi huòzhě chá ， dōuxíng 。
Translate1: I drink coffee or tea, it doesn't matter.

Pinyin1: xīngqīliù huòzhě xīngqītiān ， dōu kěyǐ 。
Chinese1: 星期六或者星期天，都可以。
Translate1: Saturday or Sunday, it doesn't matter.

Pinyin1: jīntiān wǎnshàng wǒ xiǎng chī pīsà huòzhě shòusī 。
Chinese1: 今天晚上我想吃披萨或者寿司。
Translate1: I want to eat pizza or sushi tonight.

Pinyin1: zhōumò de shíhou ， wǒ xǐhuan zàijiā zuòfàn huòzhě kàn diànyǐng 。
Chinese1: 周末的时候，我喜欢在家做饭或者看电影。
Translate1: On weekends, I like to cook at home or watch movies.

Pinyin1: nǐ qù huòzhě tā qù ， dōu kěyǐ 。
Translate1: You go or she goes, it doesn't matter.

Pinyin1: xiàbān yǐhòu wǒ qù nǐjiā huòzhě nǐ lái wǒjiā ， dōu kěyǐ 。
Chinese1: 下班以后我去你家或者你来我家，都可以。
Translate1: It doesn't matter if I go to your house after get off work or you come to my house.

Pinyin1: xiàgèyuè wǒ dǎsuàn qù hángzhōu huòzhě sūzhōu lǚxíng 。
Chinese1: 下个月我打算去杭州或者苏州旅行。
Translate1: I plan to travel to Hangzhou or Suzhou next month.

Pinyin1: wǒmen kěyǐ zuòfēijī huòzhě zuò gāotiě qù 。
Chinese1: 我们可以坐飞机或者坐高铁去。
Translate1: We can go by plane or by high-speed train.

Pinyin1: wǎnfàn yǐhòu wǒ hé jiārén liáotiān huòzhě kàndiànshì 。
Chinese1: 晚饭以后我和家人聊天或者看电视。
Translate1: After dinner, I chat with my family or watch TV.

Pinyin1: tā bù tīng ， nà wǒ yīnggāi zěnmebàn ？
Chinese1: 他不听，那我应该怎么办？
Translate1: He won't listen, so what should I do?

Pinyin1: nǐ shuō zhège bànfǎ bùxíng ， nà nǐ yǒu biéde bànfǎ ma ？
Chinese1: 你说这个办法不行，那你有别的办法吗？
Translate1: You say this method doesn’t work, so do you have another method?

Pinyin1: dàjiā dōu dào le ， nàme wǒmen kāishǐ bā 。
Chinese1: 大家都到了，那么我们开始吧。
Translate1: Everyone is here, so let's get started.

Pinyin1: yǔtíng le ， nà wǒmen zǒu bā 。
Translate1: The rain has stopped, so let's go.

Pinyin1: nǐ shuō dé yǒu dàoli ， nàme jiù zhème bàn bā 。
Chinese1: 你说得有道理，那么就这么办吧。
Translate1: You're right, so let's do it.

Pinyin1: tāxuéguò shínián zhōngwén ？
Translate1: He has studied Chinese for ten years?

Pinyin1: tā biǎoxiàn bùcuò ， nàme ràng tā tōngguò bā 。
Chinese1: 他表现不错，那么让他通过吧。
Translate1: He's doing well, so let him pass.

Pinyin1: tāmen méiyǒu tíqián tōngzhī wǒmen ， nàme zhèshì tāmen de zérèn 。
Chinese1: 他们没有提前通知我们，那么这是他们的责任。
Translate1: They didn't inform us in advance, so it's their responsibility.

Pinyin1: shíxiàn zhège mùbiāo yīnggāi bùnán ， nàme wǒmen yīqǐ nǔlì bā 。
Chinese1: 实现这个目标应该不难，那么我们一起努力吧。
Translate1: It shouldn't be difficult to achieve this goal, so let's work together.

Pinyin1: wǒ zuótiān gēn péngyou qù hǎitān le 。
Chinese1: 我昨天跟朋友去海滩了。
Translate1: I went to the beach with my friends yesterday.

Pinyin1: bùyào gēn wǒ shuōhuà ！
Translate1: Do not talk to me!

Pinyin1: wǒ míngtiān yào gēn xīn kèhù jiànmiàn 。
Chinese1: 我明天要跟新客户见面。
Translate1: I have a meeting with a new client tomorrow.

Pinyin1: nǐ shénme shíhou gēn nǐ nǚpéngyou jiéhūn ？
Chinese1: 你什么时候跟你女朋友结婚？
Translate1: When did you marry your girlfriend?

Pinyin1: nǐ xǐhuan gēn nǐ fùmǔ liáotiān ma ？
Chinese1: 你喜欢跟你父母聊天吗？
Translate1: Do you like chatting with your parents?

Pinyin1: nǐ xiǎng gēn wǒ yīqǐ qù ma ？
Translate1: do you want to come with me

Pinyin1: qǐng nǐmen gēn lǎoshī yīqǐ dú 。
Translate1: Please read it with the teacher.

Pinyin1: xiàzhōu shéi gēn lǎobǎn yīqǐ chūchāi ？
Chinese1: 下周谁跟老板一起出差？
Translate1: Who's going on a business trip with the boss next week?

Pinyin1: wǒyào gēn nǐ jiànmiàn 。
Translate1: I want to meet you.

Pinyin1: wǒ zuótiān jiànmiàn tā le 。
Translate1: I met him yesterday.

Pinyin1: nǐ shénme shíhou gēn tā jiànmiàn ？
Translate1: When will you meet her?

Pinyin1: míngtiān wǒyào gēn wǒ nánpéngyou de jiārén jiànmiàn 。
Chinese1: 明天我要跟我男朋友的家人见面。
Translate1: I'm meeting my boyfriend's family tomorrow.

Pinyin1: gēn wǒ dú 。
Translate1: read with me.

Pinyin1: hé wǒ yīqǐ dú 。
Translate1: Read it with me.

Pinyin1: gēn wǒ yīqǐ dú 。
Translate1: Read it with me.

Pinyin1: wǒ háishi tā ？
Translate1: me or him?

Pinyin1: yīgè háishi liǎnggè ？
Translate1: one or two?

Pinyin1: là de háishi bùlà de ？
Translate1: Spicy or not?

Pinyin1: bīng de háishi rè de ？
Translate1: Ice or hot?

Pinyin1: shànghǎi háishi běijīng ？
Translate1: Shanghai or Beijing?

Pinyin1: zhè shì shuǐ háishi jiǔ ？
Translate1: Is this water or wine?

Pinyin1: nǐ yào hēchá háishi kāfēi ？
Translate1: Would you like tea or coffee?

Pinyin1: nǐmen xiǎng chī zhōngguó cài háishi fǎguócài ？
Chinese1: 你们想吃中国菜还是法国菜？
Translate1: Do you want Chinese food or French food?

Pinyin1: chīfàn yǐqián ， nǐ xǐshǒu le ma ？
Translate1: Did you wash your hands before eating?

Pinyin1: shuìjiào yǐqián ， bùyào chī dōngxi 。
Translate1: Before going to bed, do not eat.

Pinyin1: liǎngnián yǐqián ， nǐ rènshi tā ma ？
Translate1: Did you know him two years ago?

Pinyin1: xīngqīwǔ yǐqián ， nǐ yào zuò wán zhèxiē gōngzuò 。
Chinese1: 星期五以前，你要做完这些工作。
Translate1: You have until Friday to finish this work.

Pinyin1: shàng dàxué yǐqián ， nǐ lái guò shànghǎi ma ？
Chinese1: 上大学以前，你来过上海吗？
Translate1: Have you ever been to Shanghai before going to university?

Pinyin1: èrshínián yǐqián ， zhèlǐ shì yīgè gōngyuán 。
Chinese1: 二十年以前，这里是一个公园。
Translate1: Twenty years ago, this was a park.

Pinyin1: jǐge yuè yǐqián ， tāmen fēnshǒu le 。
Chinese1: 几个月以前，他们分手了。
Translate1: They broke up a few months ago.

Pinyin1: bìyè yǐqián ， wǒyào zhǎodào gōngzuò 。
Chinese1: 毕业以前，我要找到工作。
Translate1: Before I graduate, I need to find a job.

Pinyin1: yǐqián wǒ bùhuì shuō zhōngwén 。
Translate1: I didn't speak Chinese before.

Pinyin1: nǐ yǐqián zhù zài nǎr ？
Translate1: where did you live before

Pinyin1: yǐqián wǒ bù rènshi tā 。
Translate1: I didn't know him before.

Pinyin1: yǐqián tā shì wǒmen de kèhù ma ？
Chinese1: 以前他是我们的客户吗？
Translate1: Was he our customer before?

Pinyin1: yǐqián tā shì yīgè fúwùyuán ， xiànzài shì lǎobǎn 。
Chinese1: 以前他是一个服务员，现在是老板。
Translate1: He used to be a waiter, now he is the boss.

Pinyin1: wǒ fùmǔ yǐqián dōu shì lǎoshī 。
Translate1: Both my parents used to be teachers.

Pinyin1: tāmen yǐqián méiyǒu qián ， kěshì hěn kuàilè 。
Chinese1: 他们以前没有钱，可是很快乐。
Translate1: They had no money before, but they were very happy.

Pinyin1: nǐ gāngcái shuō shénme le ？
Translate1: What did you just say?

Pinyin1: gāngcái shéi lái le ？
Translate1: Who came just now?

Pinyin1: gāngcái nǐ qù nǎr le ？
Translate1: Where did you go just now?

Pinyin1: gāngcái wǒ qù xǐshǒujiān le 。
Translate1: I went to the bathroom just now.

Pinyin1: lǎobǎn gāngcái shēngqì le 。
Translate1: The boss just got angry.

Pinyin1: nǐmen gāngcái zài kàn shénme ？
Translate1: What were you looking at just now?

Pinyin1: bùhǎoyìsi ， wǒ gāngcái chūqù le 。
Chinese1: 不好意思，我刚才出去了。
Translate1: Sorry, I went out just now.

Pinyin1: bǎobǎo gāngcái kū le 。
Translate1: The baby just cried.

Pinyin1: tāmen gāngcái qù kāihuì le 。
Translate1: They just went to a meeting.

Pinyin1: gāngcái yǒurén zhǎo nǐ 。
Translate1: Someone was looking for you just now.

Pinyin1: kǎoshì shí bùyào shuōhuà 。
Translate1: Do not talk during the test.

Pinyin1: wǒ miànshì shí jīngcháng huì wèn zhège wèntí 。
Chinese1: 我面试时经常会问这个问题。
Translate1: This question is often asked during my interviews.

Pinyin1: wǒ shēngqì shí bùxiǎng shuōhuà 。
Translate1: I don't want to talk when I'm angry.

Pinyin1: tāmen dàxuébìyè shí jiù fēnshǒu le 。
Chinese1: 他们大学毕业时就分手了。
Translate1: They broke up when they graduated from college.

Pinyin1: fēijī qǐfēishí ， tāguān le shǒujī hé diànnǎo 。
Chinese1: 飞机起飞时，他关了手机和电脑。
Translate1: When the plane took off, he turned off his mobile phone and computer.

Pinyin1: wǒmen gōngsī chénglì shí zhǐyǒu sānge rén 。
Chinese1: 我们公司成立时只有三个人。
Translate1: There were only three people when our company was founded.

Pinyin1: gēn biéren shuōhuà shí bùyào wán shǒujī 。
Chinese1: 跟别人说话时不要玩手机。
Translate1: Don't use your phone while talking to others.

Pinyin1: yǐhòu nǐmen huìxiǎng wǒ ma ？
Translate1: Will you miss me in the future?

Pinyin1: yǐhòu nǐ xiǎnglái zhōngguó ma ？
Translate1: Do you want to come to China in the future?

Pinyin1: wǒ yǐhòu bù hējiǔ le 。
Translate1: I won't drink anymore.

Pinyin1: wǒmen yǐhòu bù zài zhèlǐ gōngzuò le 。
Chinese1: 我们以后不在这里工作了。
Translate1: We will no longer work here.

Pinyin1: nǐ érzi yǐhòu xiǎng zuò shénme ？
Translate1: What does your son want to do in the future?

Pinyin1: yǐhòu nǐmen xiǎng qù nǎr gōngzuò ？
Chinese1: 以后你们想去哪儿工作？
Translate1: Where do you want to work in the future?

Pinyin1: yǐhòu wǒmen huì yǒu yīxiē xīn de tóngshì 。
Chinese1: 以后我们会有一些新的同事。
Translate1: We will have some new colleagues in the future.

Pinyin1: yǐhòu nǐ kěyǐ zhù zài zhèlǐ 。
Translate1: You can live here in the future.

Pinyin1: tāmen yǐhòu huì jiéhūn ma ？
Translate1: Will they get married later?

Pinyin1: nǐ yǐhòu bùyào gēn tā jiànmiàn le 。
Chinese1: 你以后不要跟他见面了。
Translate1: You don't want to meet him again.

Pinyin1: tā shuō tā huì lái ， hòulái yòu shuōbùlái le 。
Chinese1: 他说他会来，后来又说不来了。
Translate1: He said he would come, then said no.

Pinyin1: tāmen shàngzhōu chǎojià le ， hòulái hé hǎo le 。
Chinese1: 他们上周吵架了，后来和好了。
Translate1: They had a fight last week and made up later.

Pinyin1: tā yǐqián shì chúshī ， hòulái dāng le lǎobǎn 。
Chinese1: 他以前是厨师，后来当了老板。
Translate1: He used to be a chef and later became a boss.

Pinyin1: wǒ zuówǎn zǒu dé zǎo ， bù zhīdào hòulái fāshēng le shénme 。
Chinese1: 我昨晚走得早，不知道后来发生了什么。
Translate1: I left early last night and don't know what happened afterwards.

Pinyin1: kāishǐ wǒ fùmǔ bù tóngyì ， hòulái tāmen tóngyì le 。
Chinese1: 开始我父母不同意，后来他们同意了。
Translate1: At first my parents disagreed, but then they agreed.

Pinyin1: kōngtiáo wǒ shànggèyuè xiūhǎo le ， hòulái yòuhuàile 。
Chinese1: 空调我上个月修好了，后来又坏了。
Translate1: I had the air conditioner fixed last month and then it broke again.

Pinyin1: tāmen zài yīqǐ chàbuduō sānnián ， hòulái fēnshǒu le 。
Chinese1: 他们在一起差不多三年，后来分手了。
Translate1: They were together for almost three years before breaking up.

Pinyin1: tā yǐqián shì jiānzhí lǎoshī ， hòulái zuò le quánzhí 。
Chinese1: 她以前是兼职老师，后来做了全职。
Translate1: She used to be a part-time teacher and later became a full-time teacher.

Pinyin1: wǒ de dàxuélǎoshī cízhí le ， hòulái qù shànghǎi zuòshēngyì le 。
Chinese1: 我的大学老师辞职了，后来去上海做生意了。
Translate1: My university teacher resigned and went to Shanghai to do business.

Pinyin1: běijīng yǐqián jiào běipíng ， hòulái gǎichéng le běijīng 。
Chinese1: 北京以前叫北平，后来改成了北京。
Translate1: Beijing used to be called Beiping, but later it was changed to Beijing.

Pinyin1: lǎobǎn zuótiān hē le qībā píng húluóbǔzhī 。
Chinese1: 老板昨天喝了七八瓶胡萝卜汁。
Translate1: The boss drank seven or eight bottles of carrot juice yesterday.

Pinyin1: yīliǎngtiān
Translate1: a day or two

Pinyin1: sānsìgè rén
Translate1: three or four people
